name: SOS Daily Rescue Facial Spray with Hypochlorous Acid
about: What it is: An award-winning daily facial spray that soothes + purifies stressed-out skin helping to calm visible irritation and redness...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hypochlorous Acid: Naturally produced by the body's immune system, it's anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties help defend your skin from harmful bacteria, reduce redness, and soothe irritation..- Water and Sodium Chloride: Act as the optimal delivery solution for hypochlorous acid...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This spray is 100% natural, derm-tested, and clinically proven. Powered by hypochlorous acid, it's anti-inflammatory + antibacterial and helps calm your skin, support the skin barrier, and keep flare-ups at bay. This unique solution is pH balanced (4.5), alcohol-free, and safe to use all over the body. This product also has the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance...Clinical Results: Based on a third party clinical test with 32 people after 4 weeks:.- 90% agree this spray helped renew and purify skin After 6 weeks:.- 90% agree this spray helped soothe skin over time.- 94% agree this spray helped renew and purify skin...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Hypochlorous Acid: Naturally produced by the body's immune system, it's anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties help defend your skin from harmful bacteria, reduce redness, and soothe irritation..-Water and Sodium Chloride: Act as the optimal delivery solution for hypochlorous acid...Water, Sodium Chloride, Hypochlorous Acid.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use morning and evening. .-For best results, spray on dry, freshly- cleansed skin..-Let dry down completely before applying moisturizer..-Use for blemishes, sunburns, rashes, eczema, post-workout, and post-procedure....Recycling Instructions:.-New packaging is made from 100 percent post-consumer resin (recycled plastic).

reviews.review_text: This saved me and my eczema! Every single winter I get a patch of eczema right on the middle of my neck. Itu2019s irritating, painful, and impossible to get rid of. On top of that, itu2019s very noticeable and makes me self conscious sometimes. It lasts from November through about April, almost half the year! Iu2019ve tried almost every eczema product out there, and while some helped, none of them got rid of it, just made it look and feel slightly better. I heard about this and some people online saying that it helps with eczema. I decided to give it a try. I bought a bottle on Sunday. Itu2019s now Wednesday. Iu2019ve used it once every day since buying it and my eczema patch is almost completely gone! Itu2019s just a faint spot now and I expect it to clear up completely in another day or so. I saw noticeable improvements the very next day and itu2019s gotten better every single day. This has seriously saved me! If you have eczema definitely give this a try.   Iu2019ll round out my review by saying that some people comment on the smell. The person who rang me up at Sephora also mentioned that some people donu2019t like the smell, just to prepare me. I honestly donu2019t think itu2019s that bad. It smells a little like bleach (not nearly as strong, just a faint hint of it), but it goes away after drying and doesnu2019t bother me. Granted, Iu2019m using it on my neck and not on my face so that might have an impact on how intense it is for me. Either way, donu2019t let the smell scare you away if you feel like this product could really help you!

reviews.review_text: I watched one video that came up on my feed one day and saw this woman had this product because she herself has sensitive skin and this product she uses it daily. Truly love the fact it has only 3 ingredients! I hate a product that people Swear by but has a billion ingredients that half the population can't pronounce. So I am a very happy customer with this product and was the only product I bought at sephora being my first time in there nothing else really caught my attention I bee lined it to the product and walked to the checkout. I of course need to get the refill for this because I use it as much as I want and it never feels as though there's something sitting on my face not once. Try it if you have similar issues to mine or don't more for me! Just kidding! But seriously try it out you won't be sorry!.
